question:
Among the accounts who have loan validity more than 12 months, list out the accounts that have the highest approved amount and have account opening date in 1993.
Loan validity more than 12 months refers to duration > 12
query: SELECT T1.account_id FROM loan AS T1 INNER JOIN account AS T2 ON T1.account_id = T2.account_id WHERE TO_CHAR(CAST(T2.date AS TIMESTAMP), 'YYYY') = '1993' AND T1.duration > 12 ORDER BY T1.amount DESC NULLS LAST LIMIT 1
